topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546986426368727ac3320000#post_546986426368727ac3320000
Hey whatever works for you. I can honestly say that while I have had some good times while drunk (due to lowered inhibitions and all that) I've also had some fucking miserable times as a result of being so.

question.

how does everyone act when drunk?

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546986fd6368725396260200#post_546986fd6368725396260200

Aggressive > Melacholic/Crying > Sleep

In that order. I've seen videos of me drunk. Embarassing doesn't even begin to describe it

topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
when im drunk i become like, completely senseless.

like my willingness to do everything increases, i still hold SOME sense of shame, but when im drunk i would something like take a girl to dance, or like stare at a picture of a guy half naked (which i have in my tablet) for about 10 minutes while people talk to me, for some reason.

and i will ALWAYS have a smile in my face.

also i joke and become more sarcastic and cynical, like EVEN far more than before
